name: Tic-80 Pacman
description:
This a game I created in my first year at university. You can find more of my projects on my Instagram: @Sam_Mifflin.

https://www.instagram.com/sam_mifflin/

Use the arrow keys to collect all of the peas whilst avoiding the ghosts. Made using Tic 80.

Can you collect the the peas before the ghosts catch you???

I hope you enjoy.
